summary: A configuration container that encapsulates all architectural and hyper‑parameter settings required to build a Kosmos‑2 multimodal transformer, including separate text and vision sub‑configurations and the number of latent query tokens linking image features to the text decoder.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to define, adjust, and share the setup of a Kosmos‑2 model, allowing consistent instantiation of the multimodal architecture with customizable text and vision components and latent query size for reproducible experiments and deployment.
